overview: Candy is the host of a hot TV show called "The Cock Show". She interviews young, handsome "cocksmen" and reviews their latest sexy videos. The problem is, she's having a hard time keeping more than the ratings up. Between her star interview expecting "special" treatment and her boss' ideas about how she can keep her job, Candy just might end up throwing in the towel and giving up on men all together.
title: Candy's Cock Show
